reviewText: If you want to get into the minds of women, this is the choice for you.  I highly recommend this to anyone who wants an honest look at sexuality from a woman's perspective.

The stories are delivered with such honesty.  These women young and old have some amazing stories of virginity loss.  One of them even admits that they have a story they tell their friends and then the real story.  It's amazing how the stories are similar across race, age and generations.  Women have been keeping these kinds of details to themselves and now they're letting us in through the eyes of two skilled filmmakers.
I have to tell you that these ladies stories are compelling and wonderful.  Parents and young women should watch this together.  Thanks to all.
This really is an excellent experience.  The women are so honest and forthcoming. Women really are awesome creatures.

I have never seen a more honest look at a sexual topic.  It's obvious that this was directed and shot by women, but men still play a major role in each story told.  It's amazing how this experience cuts across race, age and culture and seems to be remarkable similar.  It's a story that all young people should hear.  Watch it with your daughter or son.
